entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cardston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cardston 03:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -13.6°C
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
